pageProduct.name: Rosken Skin Repair Intensive Moisture Hand Cream 75ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Rosken Intensive Moisture Hand Cream is a nourishing, moisture boosting formula specifically formulated for dry to very dry skin.

Rosken Intensive Moisture Hand Cream is a nourishing, moisture boosting hand cream specifically formulated for dry to very dry skin. It helps to increase skin moisture levels and lock in moisture from the first application, doubling moisture levels in just four days.

Rosken Intensive Moisture Hand Cream helps to:
- Provide instant & long-lasting moisture to the skin.
- Significantly increase the skin moisture levels over time.
- Enhance the skin's natural protective layer.

Size: 75mL

Ingredients

Glycerin, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil,Dimethicone, Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum), Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, BHT, Disodium EDTA, Methylparaben, Imidazolidinyl Urea, Propylparaben, Fragrance (Parfum), Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene.

Directions

Use daily to achieve noticeable long-lasting moisturising to your dry skin.
For external use only.
